h2801.definition: a primitive root; to engrave; graven.

h2802.definition: from {{h2801}} (but equivalent to {{h2793}}); forest; Chereth, a thicket in Palestine; Hereth.

h2803.definition: a primitive root; properly, to plait or interpenetrate, i.e. (literally) to weave or (generally) to fabricate; figuratively, to plot or contrive (usually in a malicious sense); hence (from the mental effort) to think, regard, value, compute; (make) account (of), conceive, consider, count, cunning (man, work, workman), devise, esteem, find out, forecast, hold, imagine, impute, invent, be like, mean, purpose, reckon(-ing be made), regard, think.

h2805.definition: from {{h2803}}; a belt or strap (as being interlaced); curious girdle.

h2806.definition: from {{h2803}} and {{h1777}}; considerate judge; Chasbaddanah, an Israelite; Hasbadana.

h2807.definition: from {{h2803}}; estimation; Cashubah, an Israelite; Hashubah.

h2808.definition: from {{h2803}}; properly, contrivance; by implication, intelligence; account, device, reason.

h2809.definition: the same as {{h2808}}; Cheshbon, a place East of the Jordan; Heshbon.

h2810.definition: from {{h2803}}; a contrivance, i.e. actual (a warlike machine) or mental (a machination); engine, invention.

h2811.definition: or חֲשַׁבְיָהוּ; from {{h2803}} and {{h3050}}; Jah has regarded; Chashabjah, the name of nine Israelites; Hashabiah.

h2812.definition: feminine of {{h2808}}; inventiveness; Chashnah, an Israelite; Hashabnah.

h2813.definition: from {{h2808}} and {{h3050}}; thought of Jah; Chashabnejah, the name of two Israelites; Hashabniah.

h2814.definition: a primitive root; to hush or keep quiet; hold peace, keep silence, be silent, (be) still.

h2815.definition: from {{h2803}}; intelligent; Chashshub, the name of two or three Israelites; Hashub, Hasshub.

h2816.definition: (Aramaic) from a root corresponding to {{h2821}}; the dark; darkness.

h2817.definition: or חֲשֻׂפָא; from {{h2834}}; nakedness; Chasupha, one of the Nethinim; Hashupha, Hasupha.

h2818.definition: (Aramaic) a collateral root to one corresponding to {{h2363}} in the sense of readiness; to be necessary (from the idea of convenience) or (transitively) to need; careful, have need of.

h2819.definition: from a root corresponding to {{h2818}}; necessity; be needful.

h2820.definition: a primitive root; also interchangeable	with {{h2821}}; to restrain or (reflex.) refrain; by implication, to refuse, spare, preserve; to observe; assuage, × darken, forbear, hinder, hold back, keep (back), punish, refrain, reserve, spare, withhold.

h2821.definition: a primitive root; to be dark (as withholding light); transitively, to darken; be black, be (make) dark, darken, cause darkness, be dim, hide.

h2822.definition: from {{h2821}}; the dark; hence (literally) darkness; figuratively, misery, destruction, death, ignorance, sorrow, wickedness; dark(-ness), night, obscurity.

h2825.definition: or חֲשֵׁיכָהxlit chăshêkâh corrected to chăshêykâh; from {{h2821}}; darkness; figuratively, misery; darkness.

h2826.definition: a primitive root; to make (intrans. be) unsteady, i.e. weak; feeble.

h2827.definition: (Aramaic) a root corresponding to {{h2826}}; to weaken, i.e. crush; subdue.

h2828.definition: from the same as {{h2831}}; enriched; Chashum, the name of two or three Israelites; Hashum.

h2829.definition: the same as {{h2831}}; opulent; Cheshmon, a place in Palestine; Heshmon.

h2830.definition: of uncertain derivation; probably bronze or polished spectrum metal; amber.

h2831.definition: from an unused root (probably meaning firm or capacious in resources); apparently; wealthy; princes.

h2832.definition: feminine of {{h2831}}; fertile; Chasmonah, a place in the Desert; Hashmonah.

h2833.definition: from an unused root probably meaning to contain or sparkle; perhaps a pocket (as holding the Urim and Thummim), or rich (as containing gems), used only of the gorget of the highpriest; breastplate.

h2834.definition: a primitive root; to strip off, i.e. generally to make naked (for exertion or in disgrace), to drain away or bail up (a liquid); make bare, clean, discover, draw out, take, uncover.

h2835.definition: from {{h2834}}; properly, drawn off, i.e. separated; hence, a small company (as divided from the rest); little flock.

h2836.definition: a primitive root; also interchangeable for {{h2820}}; to cling, i.e. join, (figuratively) to love, delight in; elliptically; to deliver; have a delight, (have a) desire, fillet, long, set (in) love.

h2838.definition: or חָשׁוּק; past participle of {{h2836}}; attached, i.e. a fence-rail or rod connecting the posts or pillars; fillet.

h2839.definition: from {{h2836}}; conjoined, i.e. a wheel-spoke or rod connecting the hub with the rim; felloe.

h2840.definition: from an unused root meaning to bind together; combined, i.e. the nave or hub of a wheel (as holding the spokes together); spoke.

h2841.definition: from the same as {{h2840}}; properly, a combination or gathering, i.e. of watery clouds; dark.

h2842.definition: by variation for {{h7179}}; dry grass; chaff.

h2843.definition: patronymically from {{h2364}}; a Chushathite or descendant of Chushah; Hushathite.

h2844.definition: from {{h2865}}; concretely, crushed; also afraid; abstractly, terror; broken, dismayed, dread, fear.

h2845.definition: from {{h2865}}; terror; Cheth, an aboriginal Canaanite; Heth.

h2846.definition: a primitive root; to lay hold of; especially to pick up fire; heap, take (away).

h2848.definition: from {{h2853}}; swathed, i.e. a bandage; roller.

h2850.definition: patronymically from {{h2845}}; a Chittite, or descendant of Cheth; Hittite, Hittities.

h2852.definition: a primitive root; properly, to cut off, i.e. (figuratively) to decree; determine.

h2853.definition: a primitive root; to swathe; × at all, swaddle.

h2854.definition: from {{h2853}}; a swathing cloth (figuratively); swaddling band.

h2855.definition: from {{h2853}}; enswathed; Chethlon, a place in Palestine; Hethlon.

h2856.definition: a primitive root; to close up; especially to seal; make an end, mark, seal (up), stop.

h2857.definition: (Aramaic) a root corresponding to {{h2856}}; to seal; seal.

h2858.definition: feminine active participle of {{h2856}}; a seal; signet.

h2859.definition: a primitive root; to give (a daughter) away in marriage; hence (generally) to contract affinity by marriage; join in affinity, father in law, make marriages, mother in law, son in law.

h2860.definition: from {{h2859}}; a relative by marriage (especially through the bride); figuratively, a circumcised child (as a species of religious espousal); bridegroom, husband, son in law.

h2862.definition: a primitive root; to clutch; take away.

h2863.definition: from {{h2862}}; properly, rapine; figuratively, robbery; prey.

h2864.definition: a primitive root; to force a passage, as by burglary; figuratively, with oars; dig (through), row.

h2865.definition: a primitive root; properly, to prostrate; hence, to break down, either (literally) by violence, or (figuratively) by confusion and fear; abolish, affright, be (make) afraid, amaze, beat down, discourage, (cause to) dismay, go down, scare, terrify.

h2867.definition: the same as {{h2866}}; Chathath, an Israelite; cathath. f

h2868.definition: (Aramaic) a primitive root; to rejoice; be glad

h2869.definition: the same as {{h2896}}; good; fine, good.

h2870.definition: from {{h2895}} and {{h410}}; pleasing (to) God; Tabeel, the name of a Syrian and of a Persian; Tabeal, Tabeel.

h2871.definition: passive participle of {{h2881}}; properly, dyed, i.e. a turban (probably as of colored stuff); dyed attire.

h2872.definition: from an unused root meaning to pile up; properly, accumulated; i.e. (by implication) a summit; middle, midst.

h2873.definition: a primitive root; to slaughter (animals or men); kill, (make) slaughter, slay.

h2874.definition: from {{h2873}}; properly, something slaughtered; hence, a beast (or meat, as butchered); abstractly butchery (or concretely, a place of slaughter); × beast, slaughter, × slay, × sore.

h2875.definition: the same as {{h2874}}; massacre; Tebach, the name of a Mesopotamian and of an Israelite; Tebah.

h2876.definition: from {{h2873}}; properly, a butcher; hence, a lifeguardsman (because he was acting as an executioner); also a cook (usually slaughtering the animal for food); cook, guard.

h2877.definition: (Aramaic) the same as {{h2876}}; a lifeguardsman; guard.

h2878.definition: feminine of {{h2874}} and meaning the same; flesh, slaughter.

h2879.definition: feminine of {{h2876}}; a female cook; cook.

h2880.definition: from {{h2878}}; slaughter; Tibchath, a place in Syria; Tibhath.

h2881.definition: a primitive root; to dip, to immerse; dip, plunge.

h2882.definition: from {{h2881}} and {{h3050}}; Jah has dipped; Tebaljah, an Israelite; Tebaliah.

h2883.definition: a primitive root; to sink; drown, fasten, settle, sink.

h2884.definition: plural of {{h2885}}; rings; Tabbaoth, one of the Nethinim; Tabaoth.

h2885.definition: from {{h2883}}; properly, a seal (as sunk into the wax), i.e. signet (for sealing); hence (generally) a ring of any kind; ring.

h2886.definition: from {{h2895}} and {{h7417}}; pleasing (to) Rimmon; Tabrimmon, a Syrian; Tabrimmon.

h2887.definition: probably of foreign derivation; Tebeth, the tenth Hebrew month; Tebeth.

h2888.definition: of uncertain derivation; Tabbath, a place East of the Jordan; Tabbath.

h2889.definition: or טָהֹר; from {{h2891}}; pure (in a physical, chemical, ceremonial or moral sense); clean, fair, pure(-ness).

h2891.definition: a primitive root; properly, to be bright; i.e. (by implication); to be pure (physical sound, clear, unadulterated; Levitically, uncontaminated; morally, innocent or holy); be (make, make self, pronounce) clean, cleanse (self), purge, purify(-ier, self).

h2892.definition: from {{h2891}}; literally brightness; ceremonially purification; clearness, glory, purifying.

h2893.definition: feminine of {{h2892}}; ceremonial purification; moral purity; × is cleansed, cleansing, purification(-fying).

h2894.definition: a primitive root; to sweep away; sweep.

h2895.definition: a primitive root,; to be (transitively, do or make) good (or well) in the widest sense; be (do) better, cheer, be (do, seem) good, (make) goodly, × please, (be, do, go, play) well.

h2896.definition: from {{h2895}}; good (as an adjective) in the widest sense; used likewise as a noun, both in the masculine and the feminine, the singular and the plural (good, a good or good thing, a good man or woman; the good, goods or good things, good men or women), also as an adverb (well); beautiful, best, better, bountiful, cheerful, at ease, × fair (word), (be in) favour, fine, glad, good (deed, -lier, -liest, -ly, -ness, -s), graciously, joyful, kindly, kindness, liketh (best), loving, merry, × most, pleasant,   pleaseth, pleasure, precious, prosperity, ready, sweet, wealth, welfare, (be) well(-favoured).

h2897.definition: the same as {{h2896}}; good; Tob, a region apparently East of the Jordan; Tob.

h2898.definition: from {{h2895}}; good (as a noun), in the widest sense, especially goodness (superlative concretely, the best), beauty, gladness, welfare; fair, gladness, good(-ness, thing, -s), joy, go well with.

h2899.definition: from {{h2896}} and {{h138}}; pleasing (to) Adonijah; Tob-Adonijah, an Israelite; Tob-adonijah.

h2900.definition: or טוֹבִיָּהוּ; from {{h2896}} and {{h3050}}; goodness of Jehovah; Tobijah, the name of three Israelites and of one Samaritan; Tobiah, Tobijah.
